org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.backoff
Interface Backoff

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractThreadSafeBackoff, ExponentialBackoff
public interface Backoff

An instance of a backoff algorithm. An attempt is started by getting an Attempt object via the begin() method. The attempt has method has methods to access the remaining delay before the attempt should be executed and methods to record the success or failure, which will reset or increase the backoff delay state. For example:
// Create the backoff object
Backoff backoff = new TestableBackoff();

// Begin an attempt
Attempt attempt = new backoff.begin();

// Wait until the backoff has expired
Thread.sleep(attempt.delay());

// Attempt the action and record result
boolean successful = myAction.execute();
if(successful)
    attempt.recordSuccess();
else
    attempt.recordFailure();

Author:
David R. Bild
